comment:
Tastes young, and grainy. Not a lot of malt flavor coming through. Bitter diner coffee with cream, but emphasis on the bitter not the cream.

It's alright. Would rather get Bushmills or Jameson blends at this price.
A wee harsh. Not terribly deep either. Glad I didnt buy
Light, smooth, but not much flavor - smells like rubbing alcohol - light clear color -
